about_the_game:
Embark on a thrilling journey into the shadows of a cyberpunk-infused catacomb in this intense 2D roguelike adventure. As a cyberpunk hero armed with futuristic weaponry, navigate the labyrinthine catacombs filled with eye monsters, necromancers, and skeletal foes and more!. Brace yourself for a relentless onslaught as you delve into the depths of darkness and random levels, where every step could be your last.

Key Features:

Cyberpunk Arsenal: Equip yourself with cutting-edge cyberpunk guns, each with unique abilities and devastating firepower.

Dreadful Adversaries: Encounter a nightmarish array of enemies, from haunting eye monsters that stalk your every move to cunning necromancers raising skeletal minions. Survive against relentless foes as you explore the catacombs' ever-changing terrain.

Procedural Catacombs: No two journeys are the same. The catacombs shift and rearrange themselves with each playthrough, providing a dynamic and unpredictable environment no run is too alike. Adapt to the ever-evolving challenges or face the consequences.

Dark Aesthetic: Immerse yourself in a visual world of shadows and neon. you are Cyberpunk but your world isnt!

As a cyberpunk hero armed with futuristic weaponry, navigate the labyrinthine catacombs filled with eye monsters, necromancers, and skeletal foes and more!. short_description: Embark on a cyberpunk odyssey in ever-shifting catacombs, where shadows conceal dreadful adversaries. Arm yourself with cutting-edge cyberpunk guns, facing array of stalkers. No run is alike; adapt or face consequences. Immerse in a world of shadows and neon - you're Cyberpunk, but your world isn't!
